text: Bruce Stuart Greenwood (born August 12, 1956) is a Canadian actor and musician.Bruce Greenwood Film Reference bio He is known for his roles as U.S. presidents in Thirteen Days and National Treasure: Book of Secrets, Ben Stevenson in Mao's Last Dancer and for his role as Captain Christopher Pike in the 2009 Star Trek movie and its sequel, Star Trek Into Darkness. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Quebec Category:Musicians from Quebec
title: Bruce Greenwood
